# Next.js Drag and Drop Project

## Project Overview
- **Type**: Next.js Application
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Framework**: Next.js 14+ with App Router
- **UI Library**: Shadcn UI (Tailwind CSS)
- **Features**: Drag and drop interface with resizable elements

## Project Requirements
- Drag elements from sidebar to canvas
- Drop elements anywhere on canvas
- Resize images between 30px and 100px
- No title labels or borders on dropped elements

## Development

The application is now running at: http://localhost:3001

### Features Implemented
- Draggable elements in sidebar (milk bottle, receipt, Snoopy card)
- Drop anywhere on canvas
- Resizable elements with corner handles
- Size constraints: 30px - 100px
- Clean design without borders or labels on dropped elements
